page.title: 20PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content: Bellingham parish council has 9 members and 1 clerk.One member of the council has been a member for 10 years. The job of the parish council is to :administer the cemetry and to provide allotments,and to look after parts and places of Bellingham. The area of the parish council is from Houxty Bank to Hareshaw Head and from Redesmouth to West Charlton village. The parish council does not receive government aid,instead they fix a rate for people of Bellingham to pay and raise about Â£2000 by themselves. The council is working on new things. They are:Co-operating with the sports committee on sports facilities, parking on Westlands estate and repairs to the bridge.
